The protection and security of personal data has a high priority. Therefore I strictly adhere to the rules of the German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG). In the following you will be informed about the type of data collected and the purpose for which it is used:

When you visit this page, the web server automatically records log files that cannot be assigned to a specific person. These data include, for example, browser type and version, operating system used, referrer URL (the previously visited page), IP address of the requesting computer, access date and time of the server request and the file request of the client (file name and URL). These data are collected for the purpose of statistical evaluation only. It is not passed on to third parties for commercial or non-commercial purposes.

Personal data is only collected or processed if you provide this information voluntarily, e.g. in the context of an inquiry. Provided that there are no necessary reasons in connection with a business transaction, you can revoke the previously granted approval of your personal data storage with immediate effect in writing (e.g. by e-mail or fax) at any time. Your data will not be passed on to third parties, unless a transfer is required by law.
3. Information, modification and deletion of your data
In accordance with applicable law, you can ask me in writing at any time whether and which personal data about you are stored by me. You will receive a corresponding message immediately.

Your personal data provided to me will be secured by taking all technical and organisational security measures to ensure that they are inaccessible to unauthorised third parties. When sending very sensitive data or information, it is recommended to use the postal service, as complete data security cannot be guaranteed by e-mail.
5. Changes to these data protection regulations

I will update this policy from time to time to protect your personal information. You should review this policy from time to time to stay informed about how I protect your information and continually improve the content of my website. If I make material changes in the collection, use and/or disclosure of the personal information you have provided to me, I will notify you by placing a prominent notice on the website. By using the website, you agree to the terms and conditions of these guidelines for the protection of personal data.
Please contact me if you have any questions regarding these data protection guidelines.
